Explanation for error 2: The academic hours and class hours are not the same. Academic hours refer to college or university courses, while class hours refer to the time spent in a class. The incorrect translation changes the meaning, as it implies that the student is enrolled in 12 college or university courses instead of simply attending 12 class hours.
